pkgmetadata.longdescription: # poetry-version (deprecated)## What to use insteadNow there is a better way to extract the version of the package.Assuming your package is named `mypackage`:```pythonimport importlib.metadata__version__ = importlib.metadata.version("mypackage")```This code should work as is if you are using Python >= 3.8.For Python 3.6 and 3.7 you need to install a backport: https://pypi.org/project/importlib-metadata/
